Package org.chocosolver.solver.search.strategy.strategy

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractStrategy<V extends Variable>
    An AbstractStrategy does not implicitly advance to the next decision on getDecision() (or getOppositeDecision()) invokation.
    ConflictOrdering
    Conflict Ordering Search by S.Gay, R.Hartert, C.Lecoutre and P.Schaus
    FindAndProve<V extends Variable>
    Enables to switch from one heuristic to another once a solution has been found
    GenerateAndTest
    A strategy, dedicated to IntVars, that simulates a Generate and Test behavior through a specific internal decision.
    IntStrategy
    Class to perform branching decisions over integer variables
    LastConflict
    Last Conflict heuristic Composite heuristic which hacks a mainStrategy by forcing the use of variables involved in recent conflicts
    LastConflict_old Deprecated
    Once

    RealStrategy

    SetStrategy
    Strategy for branching on set variables
    StrategiesSequencer
    A StrategiesSequencer is class for AbstractStrategy composition.
